page.title: 13The Country Life Museum
page.content: {************** The Country Life Museum was built in 1968-1970 and housed on the site of an old farm implements shed. There are many working exhibits.A wooden horse round is still in excellent working condition. Among the other exhibits are a wheelwright's shop with planes,tools and an 1850 hearse, a Victorian kitchen with a cloam oven and World War 1 tractors,corn mills, and a cider house. The{Blacksmith's Shop}was transferred to here when Gummow's Shop or Smithy was closed down in 1938 when the blacksmith,Julian,died.He was the last self employed smith at Gummow's Shop. This smithy plays a vital part in a rural area.
